name: Mario ESCALANTE, petitioner, v. Eric H. HOLDER, Jr., Attorney General.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Mario ESCALANTE, petitioner,
v.
Eric H. HOLDER, Jr., Attorney General.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until December 23, 2013, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
casebody.head_matter:
Mario ESCALANTE, petitioner,
v.
Eric H. HOLDER, Jr., Attorney General.
No. 13-7036.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 2, 2013.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until December 23, 2013, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
